text:
TELEVISION CENTER / State University of Iowa
j Iowa City
August 24, 1959
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
i
The NAEB research committee meetÂ¬
ing with Marshall McLuhan has been definitely
set for the 23rd and 24th of September* I
am sorry that we were not able to find a date
that would be satisfactory for all of you but
our schedules seem to be too heterogeneous.
Will send details on the hotel,
vouchers, etc., soon. Hope that you can make
it.
Best,
Samuel L. Becker
Chairman, NAEB
Research Committee
